Kenya : President Uhuru Kenyatta last week led his Cabinet Secretaries in making directives , which skirted the lines of illegality and betrayed the government 's impatience with contrary public opinion .
The Government issued several directives , arguably with the best of intentions , but the means of executing them smacked of ' executive arrogance ' according to an analyst .
The President led the charge by directing Treasury to pay Sh1.4 billion to two firms involved in the Anglo Leasing scandal against opposition from the general public .
